coding.display: Walk 10 feet - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]

code.text: Walk 10 feet - usual functional ability during assessment period [CMS Assessment]

coding.display: Dependent - Helper does all of the effort. Person does none of the effort to complete the activity. Or, the assistance of 2 or more helpers is required for the person to complete the activity.
